department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系
department.en: Department of Hakka Language and Social Sciences

goal.ch: 本課程結合理論與實務，介紹族群政治與投票行為的基本概念與主要理論，同時結合選舉實務案例進行討論。希望修課同學能學以致用，運用課堂所學理解族群政治與選舉，進一步關心族群公共事務且促進族群公共事務的福祉。
goal.en: This course combines theory and practice to introduce the fundamental concepts and major theories of ethnic politics and voting behavior. It also incorporates discussions on practical election cases. The goal is for students to apply what they have learned in class, gain an understanding of ethnic politics and elections, and further engage in and promote the well-being of ethnic public affairs.
